prompts: Create a graceful psychic-type Pokemon with flowing garments and an elegant demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that radiates calmness and is known for its soothing abilities.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies elegance and has a serene presence.
Generate a Pokemon with a unique combination of green and white colors and mystical powers.
Design a psychic fairy Pokemon whose beauty captivates everyone around it.
Give me a psychic-type Pokemon that has a slender body and a gentle expression.
Make a Pokemon with a long flowing dress and a tranquil aura.
